name: Nqobizitha Mlambo
bio:
Nqobizitha Mlambo is a seasoned development expert with a strong academic foundation, holding a BSc from the University of Zimbabwe and an MSc from the University of Manchester.
With a proven track record in civil society, Nqobizitha has worked extensively in Zimbabwe and Southern Africa from 2018-2022. His previous roles include Programme Officer for Advocacy & Citizen Engagement at the Zimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development, where he also led the Southern Africa People's Solidarity Network Trust Youth Network.
